title: Spaghetti carbonara
description: Discover how to make traditional spaghetti carbonara. This classic Italian pasta dish combines a silky cheese sauce with crisp pancetta and black pepper.

title: Sticky toffee pudding
description: Gorgeous, rich and delightful homemade sticky toffee pudding with homemade sticky toffee sauce and served with ice cream!

title: Fried calamari
description: Try making our crispy calamari and serve with an easy garlic mayo for a sharing starter or as part of a seafood feast.
